summary: This is an email from the Bureau of Prisons (BOP) system regarding a new drive for Maxwell, likely referring to Ghislaine Maxwell. The email appears to be internal BOP correspondence about a storage drive or media related to Maxwell's case or incarceration.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The email subject and content reference a 'new drive for Maxwell,' indicating she is the subject of the correspondence, likely Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Email about new drive for Maxwell

keyFacts: The email is dated December 4, 2020, from a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) government email system.
The subject references a 'new drive for Maxwell,' likely Ghislaine Maxwell.
The email appears to be internal BOP correspondence, indicating ongoing administrative or legal handling of Maxwell's case while in custody.
